original_text: But if the slave is still alive after one or two days, do not punish his master. The master has already lost the slave's work for that time.
korean_text: 그가 하루나 이틀을 연명하면 형벌을 면하리니 그는 상전의 재산임이라

sentences.original_text: But if the slave is still alive
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만일 그 종이 여전히 살아있다면

sentences.original_text: the slave's work for that time
